DOC.brief_summary: The goal research study compare program call Motivation And Problem-Solving ( MAPS ) standard treatment help participant history cervical cancer quit smoking .
DOC.detailed_description: Study Groups : If agree take part study , receive phone call randomly assign ( flip coin ) 1 2 possible study group : - If Group 1 , receive free self-help material , referral Quitline . The Quitline provide free quit smoking service eligible caller . - If Group 2 , receive free self-help material , referral Quitline , 6 telephone counseling session next year . You equal chance either group . No matter group , also receive 6-week supply nicotine patch . The strength nicotine patch receive depend much smoke day . You use nicotine patch direct package instruction . Unused used patch enough nicotine poison child pet . Be sure fold sticky end together do use patch . In case accidental overdose , call doctor poison control center right away . Even wish use nicotine patch , still allow take part study . Study Questionnaires : You ask complete questionnaire phone 4 time : - Month 3 - Month 6 - Month 12 - Month 18 During call , ask feeling , mood , cervical cancer diagnosis , smoke status . These call take 20 35 minute time complete . Saliva Testing : At Months 3 , 6 , 12 18 , may also ask provide saliva sample test cotinine confirm smoking status . Cotinine chemical release body break nicotine . You receive kit mail supply test . The research staff call make sure receive kit discus instruction . If question use kit , may contact study staff study . To collect saliva , put small piece cotton mouth minute . You ask mail saliva sample back research staff , use prepaid return envelope . You may contact mail , telephone , and/or email study give reminder send back kit . Telephone Counseling : If Group 2 , 6 telephone counseling session may last 30 minute . These call occur 12-month period time convenient . During call , ask motivate quit smoking , barrier quit may , factor may relate smoke stress family issue . These session digitally record . The recording use help researcher make sure counselor follow correct procedure help investigator well understand improve counseling . Length Study : Your participation study end complete final questionnaire call Month 18 . If wish leave study early , tell study staff want stop take part research study . Once tell study staff want stop participating , receive follow-up questionnaire phone call . This investigational study . The nicotine patch use study FDA approve commercially available . Up 350 participant overall take part research study . In-Depth Interviews : If agree take part study , ask complete questionnaire participate in-depth interview . Demographic Smoking History Questionnaire : At time visit ask complete questionnaire effort collect demographic smoke history information . You may refuse answer question make feel uncomfortable . The questionnaire may take 10 minute complete . In-depth Interview : You ask discuss various part new program design help woman cervical cancer quit smoking . You ask thought important think program , feeling , like . The interview design do non-threatening , non-judgemental , supportive way . The interview last 2 hour . In-depth interview audio record transcribed ( write ) . Your participation study complete interview . This investigational study . Up 30 woman take part interview . Up 350 participant overall take part research study . All enrol Stephenson Cancer Center .
DOC.criteria: 1 . 18 year age old 2 . Selfreported current smoker 3 . History cervical cancer 4 . Has work telephone number 5 . Has valid home address 6 . Speaks English , Spanish language 1 .
